title: The Beasts' Flowers Taken By Storm
alternative_title: Kedamonotachi no Hana ni Arashi / ケダモノたちの花に嵐 ;Kedamono-tachi no Hana ni Arashi
status: Kedamonotachi no Hana ni Arashi / ケダモノたちの花に嵐 ;Kedamono-tachi no Hana ni Arashi
description:
Description :
        Hitman Taiga is saved by Hibiya, a flower shop owner, when he finds himself on the streets after fleeing from his organization. He must hide his past as a hitman, but his love for this gentle man only grows stronger.
Then, one day, he gets to see Hibiya's well - built body drenched by the rain!! As he is mesmerized by this unexpectedly musucular body for such a gentle man, Hibiya asks him if he wants to touch him...
Then, he gets french kissed...!?
An eventful love comedy between a mysterious flower shop owner and a cute puppy - dog assassin
